name: Amaranth's Twinguard
passive: Twin Spirits: When you or a nearby ally champion takes damage, the other gains a shield for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown).
description: Item that provides Health, Armor, Magic Resist. Passive effect: When you or a nearby ally champion takes damage, the other gains a shield for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown).. Perfect for frontline champions who need to absorb damage.
